condition.ab: Light brown papyrus. The original cutting lines are preserved on all four sides. There are some small holes in the papyrus. Written with black ink with a thin pen perpendicular to the fibers on Recto. The ink of the top four lines has faded and also in some places at the right half of the papyrus.
